https://tmrev.io/movie/215941-Bobô 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/50ZbNFtZw64Gbu43pwmG0AxR4RW.jpg Sofia lives a strangely isolated life in the old apartment where she grew up in Lisbon. Mariama arrives from Guinea-Bissau, having been hired by Sofia’s mother to help take care of the house and her son. The appearance of Bobô, Mariama’s younger sister, awakens in Sofia the desire to take a stand. The forced cohabitation between Sofia and Mariama forces them to confront their own private ghosts. Bobô
